1346146118162329600.text: I look forward to serving the people of Rhode Island’s Second Congressional District for another term and continuing the good fight.

1346146117021560834.text: I'll work tirelessly to advance legislation to expand access to high-quality affordable health care, improve education, boost #SmallBiz during these uncertain times, protect the rights of Americans from all walks of life, & strengthen our national security.

1346146116027506691.text: As the proud representative of Rhode Island’s Second Congressional District, I’ll continue to listen intently to my constituents, advocate fiercely for their priorities, and always look out for the best interests of all Americans.
